Package ru.clevertec.news.service

Class CommentServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
ru.clevertec.news.service.CommentServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CommentService
@Service public class CommentServiceImpl extends Object implements CommentService
Service implementation for managing comments, providing operations such as retrieval, creation, updates, and archiving.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sergey Leshkevich
